metadata.title: CVE-2019-5864 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in CORS in Google Chrome prior to 76.0.3809.87allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto bypass content security policy via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
